languages.text: {n}Гнетущая сила обрушивается на вас, практически сбивая с ног. Вы чувствуете, как плавится кожа, кровь горит в венах, а кислород выжигает легкие. Слова застревают в горле, руки не слушаются — но чей-то вскрик приводит вас в чувство.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Гнетущая сила обрушивается на вас, практически сбивая с ног. Вы чувствуете, как плавится кожа, кровь горит в венах, а кислород выжигает легкие. Слова застревают в горле, руки не слушаются — но чей-то вскрик приводит вас в чувства.{/n}

languages.text: {n}An oppressive force crashes down on you, practically knocking you down. You feel your skin melt and your blood boil as the very air burns your lungs from the inside. Words get stuck in your throat and your hands refuse to obey, but somebody's scream brings you to your senses.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Гнетущая сила обрушивается на вас, практически сбивая с ног. Вы чувствуете, как плавится кожа, кровь горит в венах, а кислород выжигает легкие. Слова застревают в горле, руки не слушаются — но чей-то вскрик приводит вас в чувство.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}An oppressive force crashes down on you, practically knocking you down. You feel your skin melt and your blood boil as the very air burns out your lungs from the inside. The words get stuck in your throat and the hands refuse to obey, but somebody's scream brings you to your senses.{/n}

{n}An oppressive force crashes down on you, practically knocking you down. You feel your skin melt and your blood boil as the very air burns your lungs from the inside. Words get stuck in your throat and your hands refuse to obey, but somebody's scream brings you to your senses.{/n}

{n}An oppressive force crashes down on you, practically knocking you down. You feel your skin melt and your blood boil as the very air burns your lungs from the inside. Words get stuck in your throat and your hands refuse to obey, but somebody's scream brings you to your senses.{/n}

{n}An oppressive force crashes down on you, practically knocking you down. You feel your skin melt and your blood boil as the very air burns your lungs from the inside. Words get stuck in your throat and your hands refuse to obey, but somebody's scream brings you to your senses.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Experimentas una fuerza abrumadora que se abalanza sobre ti y casi consigue derribarte. Sientes tu piel derritiéndose y tu sangre hirviendo, mientras que el aire de tus pulmones te quema desde dentro. Las palabras se te atragantan y tus manos no responden, pero el grito de alguien te devuelve el sentido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An oppressive force crashes down on you, practically knocking you down. You feel your skin melt and your blood boil as the very air burns your lungs from the inside. Words get stuck in your throat and your hands refuse to obey, but somebody's scream brings you to your senses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Experimentas una fuerza abrumadora que se abalanza sobre ti y casi consigue derribarte. Sientes tu piel derritiéndose y tu sangre hirviendo, mientras que el aire de tus pulmones te quema desde dentro. Las palabras se te atragantan y tus manos no responden, pero el grito de alguien te devuelve el sentido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine erdrückende Macht bricht über dich herein und wirft dich praktisch um. Du spürst, wie deine Haut schmilzt und dein Blut kocht. Die Luft in deinen Lungen verbrennt dich von innen. Worte bleiben dir in der Kehle kleben und deine Hände gehorchen dir nicht mehr, doch irgendjemand schreit und du kommst wieder zu Sinnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An oppressive force crashes down on you, practically knocking you down. You feel your skin melt and your blood boil as the very air burns your lungs from the inside. Words get stuck in your throat and your hands refuse to obey, but somebody's scream brings you to your senses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine erdrückende Macht bricht über dich herein und wirft dich praktisch um. Du spürst, wie deine Haut schmilzt und dein Blut kocht. Die Luft in deinen Lungen verbrennt dich von innen. Worte bleiben dir in der Kehle kleben und deine Hände gehorchen dir nicht mehr, doch irgendjemand schreit und du kommst wieder zu Sinnen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une force oppressante vous écrase, vous renversant presque. Vous sentez votre peau fondre et votre sang bouillir, tandis que l'air brûle vos poumons de l'intérieur. Vos mots restent pris dans votre gorge et vos mains refusent de vous obéir, mais un hurlement vous fait reprendre vos esprits.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An oppressive force crashes down on you, practically knocking you down. You feel your skin melt and your blood boil as the very air burns your lungs from the inside. Words get stuck in your throat and your hands refuse to obey, but somebody's scream brings you to your senses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une force oppressante vous écrase, vous renversant presque. Vous sentez votre peau fondre et votre sang bouillir, tandis que l'air brûle vos poumons de l'intérieur. Vos mots restent pris dans votre gorge et vos mains refusent de vous obéir, mais un hurlement vous fait reprendre vos esprits.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一股压迫性的力量向你袭来，几乎要将你击倒在地。你感觉自己的皮肤在融化，血液在沸腾，肺里的空气在灼烧着你。你的话卡在喉咙里，手也不听使唤，但某个人的尖叫声让你清醒过来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An oppressive force crashes down on you, practically knocking you down. You feel your skin melt and your blood boil as the very air burns your lungs from the inside. Words get stuck in your throat and your hands refuse to obey, but somebody's scream brings you to your senses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一股压迫性的力量向你袭来，几乎要将你击倒在地。你感觉自己的皮肤在融化，血液在沸腾，肺里的空气在灼烧着你。你的话卡在喉咙里，手也不听使唤，但某个人的尖叫声让你清醒过来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}凄まじい力に押し潰される。空気が肺を内側から焼き、皮膚は溶けて血液が沸騰するのを感じた。言葉が喉につっかえて、手は言うことを聞かないが、誰かの叫び声で我に返った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An oppressive force crashes down on you, practically knocking you down. You feel your skin melt and your blood boil as the very air burns your lungs from the inside. Words get stuck in your throat and your hands refuse to obey, but somebody's scream brings you to your senses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}凄まじい力が襲いかかり、ほとんど押し潰される。空気そのものが肺を内側から焼き、皮膚は溶けて血液が沸騰するのを感じた。言葉が喉につっかえて、手は言うことを聞かないが、誰かの叫び声で我に返った。{/n}
{n}凄まじい力に押し潰される。空気が肺を内側から焼き、皮膚は溶けて血液が沸騰するのを感じた。言葉が喉につっかえて、手は言うことを聞かないが、誰かの叫び声で我に返った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ezici bir kuvvet, üzerine çökerek seni neredeyse yere yıkıyor. Cildinin eridiğini, kanının kaynadığını ve aldığın her nefesin ciğerlerini yaktığını hissediyorsun. Ellerin boşalıyor, sözlerin boğazında düğümleniyor... Derken duyduğun bir çığlık, aklını başına getiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An oppressive force crashes down on you, practically knocking you down. You feel your skin melt and your blood boil as the very air burns your lungs from the inside. Words get stuck in your throat and your hands refuse to obey, but somebody's scream brings you to your senses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ezici bir kuvvet, üzerine çökerek seni neredeyse yere yıkıyor. Cildinin eridiğini, kanının kaynadığını ve aldığın her nefesin ciğerlerini yaktığını hissediyorsun. Ellerin boşalıyor, sözlerin boğazında düğümleniyor... Derken duyduğun bir çığlık, aklını başına getiriyor.{/n}
